entity.description: White House Press Secretary Sarah Huckabee Sanders

text: @PressSec @realDonaldTrump The US government sent nearly 17.8 tons of donated medical supplies to China—including masks and respirators—almost three weeks after the first case of the coronavirus was reported in the state of Washington. Trump then told states to fend for themselves. You have no credibility.
